The Chicago Bulls defeated the Atlanta Hawks with a thrilling buzzer-beater, sparking wild celebrations among the fans.
Trae Young scored an impressive 40 points for the Hawks, proving his star power once again.
Zach LaVine's performance was crucial for the Bulls' victory, showcasing his exceptional skills.
In a surprising turn, the game went into overtime after a controversial call by the referee.
Both teams showed great sportsmanship at the end of the intense match.
